name: Hi! Hamtaro: Ham-Ham Challenge
description:
Join Hamtaro and all his friends in a variety of fun and educational
brain-training games. Children will develop their memory, word
comprehension, math skills and many other abilities as they play through
12 engaging, interactive games. Parents can monitor their child’s
growing abilities, adjust the difficulty level to match their child’s
skills, and reward them with special items. Hamtaro and his friends make
learning fun!
